text:
ShipCompliant - http://www.shipcompliant.com/careers/ - Boulder, CO

We write SaaS software for the alcohol industry in Microsoft stack with some backbone/require/react/flux frontends, it's pretty fun.

We just opened up a bunch of positions including: C# Full Stack, Front-End, and Deployment Engineers

Ask me any questions if you are interested, postings are at the bottom: http://www.shipcompliant.com/careers/
